summary: CAREFREE POWER AWNING UNROLLED DURING TRAVEL. THE END CAP (ALUMINUM CAST) BROKE WHICH ALLOWED THE  AWNING ARM TO EXTEND.  THERE ARE NO MANUAL LOCKS ON  THE POWER AWNINGS AND A MOTOR FAILURE/END CAP FAILURE RESULTS IN AWNING BEING DEPLOYED. THE AWNING ARM EXTENDED 8 FEET DAMAGING THE BAGGAGE DOOR; WITHOUT THE   ARM BEING ATTACHED THE AWNING FABRIC  UNROLLED AND PULLED THE ENTIRE AWNING OFF THE MOTORHOME.  *TR
